name: Respect
description: RESPECT - A Bootstrap Theme forked from Html-Coder/Worthy

scripts.clean: rm -rf bootstrap && rm -rf fonts && rm-rf css/animate.* && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.superupdate: npm run awesomefi && npm run bootstrapfi && npm run animatefi && npm run googfonts
scripts.awesomefi: rm -rf fonts/font-awesome && mkdir -p fonts/font-awesome && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/* fonts/font-awesome/
scripts.bootstrapfi: rm -rf bootstrap && mkdir -p bootstrap && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/* bootstrap/

author: Drew Easley (forked from Html-Coder/Worthy)
